select * from v_point where 1 = 1 and status = 1
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and merchant_id = #{merchantId}
order by ${orderByField} ASC
order by ${orderByField} DESC
order by create_time DESC

select pt.member_id AS memberId, pt.in_out, pt.point AS point, pt.create_time AS createTime, p.rule_type AS ruleType, pt.trade_type AS tradeType from v_point p ,v_point_trade pt where p.id=pt.point_id and pt.status = 1
and pt.member_id=#{memberId}
